data.title: Rollyn Boggs Obituary
data.meta_description: Obituary for Rollyn Richard Boggs | Rollyn R. Boggs, 92, of Mishawaka passed away Saturday, October 16, 2021 at Creekside Village in Mishawaka.  He was born March 8, 1929 in Fort Wayne, IN to the late Maxie and Ethel (Noll)...
data.meta_site_name: Rollyn Boggs Obituary | October 16, 2021 | South Bend, IN
data.text:
Rollyn R. Boggs, 92, of Mishawaka passed away Saturday, October 16, 2021 at Creekside Village in Mishawaka. He was born March 8, 1929 in Fort Wayne, IN to the late Maxie and Ethel (Noll) Boggs.

Rollyn is survived by his daughter, Christine (Dave) Clinton; sons, Don (Sherry) Boggs and Tom Boggs; three grandchildren, Ashley, Christopher and Alexander; and loving companion of over 30 years, Gail Engle. In addition to his parents, he is preceded in death by his brother, Franklin Boggs.

Rollyn was a project manager with AEP before retiring. He was an avid golfer, having multiple memberships to local courses in the area. Rollyn also enjoyed travelling and camping and participated in the DuPont Amateur Golf Tournament in Myrtle Beach.

In keeping with Rollyn’s wishes, there will be no services. Palmer Funeral Home-Welsheimer North Chapel and Southlawn Cremation Services are assisting the family with arrangements.

Contributions in memory of Rollyn may be given to Heart to Heart Hospice, 620 W Edison Rd #122, Mishawaka, IN 46545.

Online condolences can be sent to the family at www.palmerfuneralhomes.com.

To send flowers to the family, please visit our floral store.
